title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A classic novel about racial injustice and the loss of innocence in a small Southern town

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: A crime thriller about a journalist and a young computer hacker investigating a wealthy family's dark secrets

title: The Shining
description: A horror novel about a family trapped in a haunted hotel during the winter

title: Norwegian Wood
description: A coming-of-age novel about a young man's love affairs and struggles with loss and mental illness

title: Murder on the Orient Express
description: A classic detective novel about a murder on a luxurious train and Hercule Poirot's investigation

title: The Da Vinci Code
description: A thriller about a symbologist and a cryptologist unraveling a conspiracy involving the Holy Grail and the Catholic Church

title: The Handmaid's Tale
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian theocracy where women are forced into sexual servitude

title: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The first volume of J.R.R. Tolkien's epic fantasy series The Lord of the Rings

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A classic coming-of-age novel about a teenage boy named Holden Caulfield, who is struggling with the hypocrisy and phoniness of the adult world

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A novel that explores themes of love, marriage, and societal expectations in Georgian-era England.

title: The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle
description: A surreal novel set in Tokyo that explores themes of war, trauma, and the subconscious.
